name: Magic Garden (Nataliao)
description:
Miss Ghost has been trapped in the garden! Help her find the way out, by returning three magic stones to Holy Fountain.

The game is split into three mazes: Japan, Aztec and Celtic garden. In each garden you have to collect one magic gem, that you will place later in the fountain. In order to open next doors, fill well with water by pressing E while stading close to it. When leaving the garden press Q to destroy vines. Steer ghost with WSAD, and place gems to fountain with E. And don't forget to have fun! ;)

Art created by: Marilyn Mack, Natalia Olszewska, Dean Przybilla, Eric Schneider
